#labmuseu
Hack - Make - Explore

Oficinas

About

Jacinto 2.0 is a platform where you can create and/or solve clinical cases with learning purposes. Cases are distributed on several topics.

You can act as a learner, solving clinical cases inspired in the real world. You can likewise participate in creating new cases to be solved by others.

Contact Me

Around the Web

Credits

Freelancer is a free to use, open source Bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap.

Museu Exploratório de Ciências da Unicamp 2020

Simulação Básica

Ambiente que simula o uso do método dedutivo para, a partir de evidências, deduzir uma nova informação. Neste ambiente/jogo, o usuário assume o papel de um médico que deve diagnosticar zumbis.

  • Start Here
